about_the_game:
If the game can not start the phenomenon, please restore the game startup file Game.exe and add trust in the security software, the game engine for the js code, it is very easy to be misreported.  

Game Features:Multi-female protagonist + joyful fantasy adventure

The story content is the leading, the gameplay is supplemented by the Vivid drama frame between the game and animation to show a unique charm.
Immersive experience plot for the extremely long Light Novel original content, the game is released using the anime sub-season mode, the first season of "Tale of the Leading star" contains pure Light Novel content amounting to 350,000 words.
The unique and numerous female protagonists continue to make appearances as the story unfolds...
Traditional rpg turn battle system into the innovative strategy battle, with the plot highly customized puzzle mechanism exploration gameplay interesting and unique.

 

Another World's uncle take over numerous Beauty Yo~

In the world of swords and magic, I am a disliked uncle, with mediocre looks and nothing to show for it. I wanted to lie down in this life but I was betrayed to become cannon fodder...
I'm...not happy about it!
Sleeping until wake up naturally, counting money until hands cramp,Beauty a whole lot of such life...
Uncle I can do it too!

name: Tale of the Leading star

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11(32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
